Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.concurrent

This package contains a set of classes for using in the concurrent programming.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JUnitExecutor.CommandProcessor<Command,​Response>
    This interface is used for lambda-styled call to process "command" inside thread
    LightWeightListenerList.LightWeightListenerCallback<Listener>
    This interface describes callback for processing every listener in the listener's list.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JUnitExecutor<Command,​Response>
    This class is especially used inside JUnit tests to test multi-threaded components.
    LightWeightListenerList<Listener>
    This class is a simple implementation of listeners repository.
    LightWeightRWLockerWrapper
    This class is a wrapper to ReentrantReadWriteLock and designs especially to use in the try-with-resource statements.
    ListenableDouble
    This class is a container for keeping double value and waiting to it's "change event"
    ListenableInt
    This class is a container for keeping int value and waiting to it's "change event"
    ListenableLong
    This class is a container for keeping long value and waiting to it's "change event"
    ListenableRef<T>
    This class is a container for keeping reference value and waiting to it's "change event"
    XByteStream
    This class is used to support I/O channel between two threads.
    XCharStream
    This class is used to support I/O channel between two threads.
    XStream
    This class implements reader/writer stream pair for thread-to-thread communications.
